pullRequest.title: Remove overriding the Passive STS URL.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR resolves issue: wso2/product-is#8038
Also, this PR removes the redundant code block introduced at: https://github.com/wso2/carbon-identity-framework/pull/2637/files#diff-98664c0777759c45d183f9180c27614eR2465-R2475

commit.message: Remove overriding the Passive STS URL.

nodes.bodyText: As discussed with @chamathns, removing the above logic introduced from #2862 will not be affected as the same logic has been added at https://github.com/wso2/carbon-identity-framework/pull/2862/files#diff-98664c0777759c45d183f9180c27614eR172-R176
